name: Moments (milena)
description:
moment /ˈmōmənt/ noun a very brief period in time

“Everything always works out in the end, Milena! You will be okay, I promise you. I love you!”

Controls
  • Use [WASD] or [ARROW KEYS] or [GAME PAD] to move
  • Interact with [Z] or [A]
  • Cancel with [X] or [B]
  • Pause with [ENTER] or [START]
